basic.description: As teachers, we need to develop an understanding of First Nations, Metis, and Inuit ways and perspectives so that we can implement culturally relevant strategies in our classrooms. This Additional Qualification course will focus on providing you with an increasing awareness and understanding of each separate group of Aboriginal peoples and the existing diversity of their history, culture, and world view.
basic.subject: CONT
basic.title: First Nation, Metis, Inuit Peoples Traditional Teachings, Histories, Current Issues, Cultures Part 1
